content.p: Consider the following capacitated network with labeled capacities:
Find a minimum cut for this network.

outtro.p: The minimum cut value is {{optimalsolution}}. An example of such a cut is V_1 = \{ v_s{{#CutV1}}, v_{ {{i}} } {{/CutV1}} \}, V_2 = \{ {{#CutV2}}v_{ {{j}} }, {{/CutV2}} v_d \}.
